directions.step:
Date: Wed, 20 Mar 1996 13:05:11 -0500
From: Kattwoman1@aol.com
wash and trim artichokes. put water in a pot large enough to cover the artichokes. bring to a boil. turn down to a simmer. cook in simmering water for 15 to 20 min. or until a pulled leaf comes loose . sauce: melt butter and add a dash of garlic salt or powder. My Favorite!
